channel.title: How to make items kept on death?
channel.description: im using this source : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=529645.0 does anyone know how to make certain items kept on death? like how firecape is.

item.title: How to make items kept on death?
item.dc:creator: @austinx austinx
item.description:
@austinx wrote:

i mean like i would like to make flippers,spottier cape, ardy cape, stat hammer, and lots more kept on death, how do i do that?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items kept on death?

item.title: How to make items kept on death?
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Magicka Dead Magicka
item.description:
@Dead_Magicka wrote:

Generally within client.java, there’s a void named DeathStage.
There’s usually 2-3 of those to segregate different events of death such as dying whilst skulled, dying in minigames, dying in duel arena and just normal combat etc…
Once you’ve found that, read through each of them and scrutinize each function carefully, look for lines that may recall tokens and voids to remove items, but reserve the top 3 highest alchemic values unless skulled. If you want to stop losing items altogether, just delete that line. If you mean you want to make it just so a specific usergroup keeps their items, create an “else if” exception to that specific usergroup.

Hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items kept on death?
